lead_paragraph: Kelvim Escobar rebounded from his worst outing of the season with eight shutout innings, and the host Los Angeles Angels defeated the Los Angeles Dodgers, 4-1, yesterday to complete a sweep of the three-game interleague series between the division leaders.
